data.eml:eml: Macrocyrtus imomzodai Barševskis, 2016, a new synonym of Metapocyrtus (Orthocyrtus) orbiferoides Schultze, 1918 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yoshitake, Hiraku (2017): Macrocyrtus imomzodai Barševskis, 2016, a new synonym of Metapocyrtus (Orthocyrtus) orbiferoides Schultze, 1918 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae). Zootaxa 4254 (3): 375-376, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4254.3.5
